name: Jam Rivalry
description:
Short description:

Dahko and his brother Monkey fight in a coop puzzle platformer where only one can win,  The game is about making decisions to betray the other and more importantly when to. 

PRESS R TO RESTART IF STUCK, DO NOT TROLL OPPONENT. This is an admin tool

Player 1 (blue) controls:

  W < Jump and glide
ASD < movement

Player 2 (yellow) controls:

  ARROWUP < Jump high
ARROWLEFT ARROWDOWN ARROWRIGHT < S = Throw enities

Guide:

The game introduces you to parkour and puzzle mechanics gradually.  betraying your teammate can be very beneficial, it can put you further ahead in the race. Betraying can be done by choosing to not work together. but we don't promise we''ll be fair.  There are 3 main choices, and at any point you can choose a different path. 

Solo, slow and safe:  A path with medium risk that is very slow.

Coop, quick and safe: A path that will have medium risk and quick progress.

Solo, quick and dangerous. A traitors path. : This can put you far ahead, or far back.

As soon as one player betrays the other, it'll be necessary for the other to try to get ahead by betraying. 

CREDITS:       *WE ARE PROUD TO PROCLAIM %100 OF THE JAM IS MADE BY US*

This game was made in GODOT with GDscript and 4 hours of sleep

(no openart, no sound effects, no pre written scripts. and this is our first game jam)

-Monkey suite https://monkeysuite.itch.io/     Art & Code

-Dahko37 https://dahko-37.itch.io/   Code & Art
